import.description: Imports entire module statement in ES6 syntax

importNoModuleName.description: Imports entire module in ES6 syntax without module name

importDestructing.description: Imports only a portion of the module in ES6 syntax

importEverything.description: Imports everything as alias from the module in ES6 syntax

importAs.description: Imports a specific portion of the module by assigning a local alias in ES6 syntax

moduleExports.description: Module exports from Common JS, node syntax at ES6

exportNamedVariable.description: Export named variable in ES6 syntax

exportNamedFunction.description: Export named function in ES6 syntax

exportDefaultFunction.description: Export default function in ES6 syntax

exportClass.description: Export default class in ES6 syntax

exportClassExtends.description: Export default class which extends a base one in ES6 syntax

class.description: Create a basic class in ES6 syntax

classExtends.description: Create a basic class with extends in ES6 syntax

constructor.description: Add default constructor in a class in ES6 syntax

method.description: Create a method inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyGet.description: Create a getter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

propertyset.description: Create a setter property inside a class in ES6 syntax

forEach.description: Creates a forEach statement in ES6 syntax

forOf.description: Iterating over property names of iterable objects

forIn.description: Iterating over property values of iterable objects

anonymousFunction.description: Creates an anonymous function in ES6 syntax

namedFunction.description: Creates a named function in ES6 syntax

destructingObject.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using object destructing

destructingArray.description: Creates and assigns a local variable using array destructing

setInterval.description: Executes the given function at specified intervals in ES6 syntax

setTimeOut.description: Executes the given function after the specified delay in ES6 syntax

promise.description: Creates and returns a new Promise in the standard ES6 syntax

thenCatch.description: Add the .then and .catch methods to handle promises

consoleAssert.description: Log a message and stack trace to console if the first argument is false.

consoleDebug.description: Outputs a message to the console with the log level debug.

consoleGroup.description: Creates a new inline group, indenting all following output by another level. To move back out a level, call groupEnd().

consoleLog.description: For general output of logging information.

reactClassComponent.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system

reactClassComponentPropTypes.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system and PropTypes

reactFunctionComponent.description: Creates a React functional component with ES6 module system

reactFunctionComponentPropTypes.description: Creates a React functional component with ES6 module system and PropTypes

reactClassConstructor.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

emptyState.description: Creates empty state object. To be used in a constructor.

componentWillMount.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs.

componentDidMount.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

componentWillReceiveProps.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

componentWillUpdate.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

componentDidUpdate.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

componentWillUnmount.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate.description: Invoked right before the most recently rendered output is committed to e.g. the DOM.

getDerivedStateFromProps.description: Invoked right before calling the render method, both on the initial mount and on subsequent updates. It should return an object to update the state, or null to update nothing.

useState.description: Hook useState. Returns a stateful value, and a function to update it.

useEffect.description: Hook userEffect. Accepts a function that contains imperative, possibly effectful code.

useContext.description: Hook useContext. Accepts a context object (the value returned from React.createContext) and returns the current context value for that context.

useReducer.description: Hook useReducer. An alternative to useState. Accepts a reducer of type (state, action) => newState, and returns the current state paired with a dispatch method. (If youâ€™re familiar with Redux, you already know how this works.)

useCallback.description: Hook useCallback. Returns a memoized callback.

useMemo.description: Hook useMemo. Returns a memoized value.

useRef.description: Hook useRef. Returns a mutable ref object whose .current property is initialized to the passed argument (initialValue). The returned object will persist for the full lifetime of the component.

componentSetStateObject.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

componentSetStateFunc.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

propTypeNode.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

propTypeNodeRequired.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

propTypeInstanceOf.description: Is an instance of a class prop type

propTypeInstanceOfRequired.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

propTypeEnum.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

propTypeEnumRequired.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

propTypeOneOfType.description: An object that could be one of many types

propTypeOneOfTypeRequired.description: An object that could be one of many types required

propTypeArrayOf.description: An array of a certain type

propTypeArrayOfRequired.description: An array of a certain type required

propTypeObjectOf.description: An object with property values of a certain type

propTypeObjectOfRequired.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

propTypeObjectOfShape.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time

propTypeObjectOfShapeRequired.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time required

propTypeShape.description: An object taking on a particular shape

propTypeShapeRequired.description: An object taking on a particular shape required
